form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Rosen (for herself and Mr. Gallego) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to include extreme temperature in the definition of a major disaster.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Extreme Heat Emergency Act of 2025.
Section 102(2) of the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 5122(2)) is amended by inserting extreme temperature, before or drought.
No additional funds are authorized to be appropriated for the purpose of carrying out this Act.
